definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: If both sides make concessions, they can reach a settlement acceptable to both.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都讓點步，就能找到一個都可以接受的解決辦法。
但我還有其他解決辦法。

sentences.english: And suddenly the only solution that made sense for her. Escape.
sentences.chinese: 忽然間對她來說，唯一合理的解決辦法就是，逃跑。

sentences.english: Still another solution may come from virtu a liza tion.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個虛擬化的解決辦法。

sentences.english: Crookes came up a solution that to create a chemical fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 科魯克斯提出的解決辦法是創造一種化學肥料。

sentences.english: The traditional solution is to compress the input signal through the limited voltage device.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的解決辦法是通過壓限器對輸入信號進行壓縮。

sentences.english: Some workers remain unhappy with a settlement offered by the Japanese firm.
sentences.chinese: 一些工人仍然對日本公司提供的解決辦法感到不快。

sentences.english: The solution Crookes proposed was to create artificial fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 科魯克斯提出的解決辦法是創造一種化學肥料。

sentences.english: Obviously the solution is to resist and overthrow the oppressors.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，解決辦法就是對抗並推翻這些壓迫者。

sentences.english: It is important for you to plunge into practical work if you want to solve problems.
sentences.chinese: 深入實際工作對於找到各種問題的解決辦法十分重要。

sentences.english: Reporters in a number of community forums inquiry found the solution to the post.
sentences.chinese: 記者在一些社區論壇上發現詢問解決辦法的帖子。

sentences.english: Based on the results of analysis, solutions to the marketization of China's mineral properties are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 根據分析結果，提出了中國礦業權市場化的解決辦法。

sentences.english: Matters are very complex. It's very difficult to find a single solution to all problems.
sentences.chinese: 事情錯綜複雜，很難找到一個一了百了的解決辦法。

sentences.english: Much you have, the younger brother in this Guiqiu solution, I was half a bucket of water.
sentences.chinese: 各位大大們，小弟在此跪求解決辦法，我是半桶水。

sentences.english: Well, we know one solution to this is the following.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道一種解決辦法，下面會提到。

sentences.english: It is checkmate for india. Find different solution.
sentences.chinese: 這對印度來說是死局，找其他解決辦法吧。

definition: to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
